lead_paragraph: The French government urged the United States to lift the economic embargo against Cuba during a state visit by the Cuban president, Raúl Castro.

headline.print_headline: Europe; France: Castro Finds Advocates in Paris
headline.main: France: Castro Finds Advocates in Paris

snippet: The French government urged the United States to lift the economic embargo against Cuba during a state visit by the Cuban president, Raúl Castro.
abstract: French government calls on United States to end economic embargo against Cuba, in middle of state visit by Cuban Pres Raul Castro to Paris.
